name: A Restless Walk
description:
Submission for MiniJam 99: Birds

You are an NPC in a GB game with restless leg syndrome. You decide to take a quick walk and then go back to sleep. You have a low battery on your flashlight so you turn it off when you are not walking. How does this fit the theme? There are bird sounds, and you cannot stop walking if you want light.

Made using Godot, Aseprite, and Audacity.

WASD - move
Shift - Sprint
Space - Jump
Esc - Quit game

This is actually just a walking simulator at this point.

Credit to https://godotengine.org/asset-library/asset/424 for the FPS controller.
